TestCase.name: testDynamic
TestCase.Resource: INSERT INTO sink SELECT a, b, c FROM MyTable

LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a, b, c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testDynamicShuffleBy
TestCase.Resource: INSERT INTO sinkShuffleBy SELECT a, b, c FROM MyTable

LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sinkShuffleBy], fields=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sinkShuffleBy], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, c]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testPartial
TestCase.Resource: INSERT INTO sink PARTITION (b=1) SELECT a, c FROM MyTable

LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a, EXPR$1, c]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[1:BIGINT], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a, EXPR$1, c]) +- Calc(select=[a, 1:BIGINT AS EXPR$1, c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testStatic
TestCase.Resource: INSERT INTO sink PARTITION (b=1, c=1) SELECT a FROM MyTable

LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a, EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[1:BIGINT], EXPR$2=[1:BIGINT]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a, EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- Calc(select=[a, 1:BIGINT AS EXPR$1, 1:BIGINT AS EXPR$2]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testWrongFields
TestCase.Resource: INSERT INTO sink PARTITION (b=1) SELECT a, b, c FROM MyTable

TestCase.name: testWrongStatic
TestCase.Resource: INSERT INTO sink PARTITION (a=1) SELECT b, c FROM MyTable
